Blacksmith Momet:
You want to bestow special abilities on your weapons?
Don't worry about the enchant. Enhancing the weapons will not make the enchant disappear. The new abilities for the items will be shown below the information. You do know that you can only see the weapons you already have?
Also A-Grade weapons and above cannot be handled by just anyone. I can't help you with that. Perhaps the legendary Blacksmith of Mammon can do it.
Also, when you want to remove any special abilities, the Blacksmith of Mammon can help you with that. There are rumors that the Black Marketeer of Mammon too has learned how to remove special abilities.
Choose the capabilities you wish to add to your weapons!
